content: Absolutely! Joe Mixon is a talented running back who has the ability to be one of the best in the league. He's a powerful runner who can break tackles, as well as a capable receiver out of the backfield. If the Bengals can establish a strong running game with Mixon, it will take some pressure off of Burrow and help keep opposing defenses honest. This could open up opportunities for Burrow and the passing game to make big plays down the field. With the combination of Mixon, Burrow, and the talented group of receivers, the Bengals offense could be a force to be reckoned with this season.
